module_doc:
Test ExecutionMode enum and smart suggestions

Epic 5 Phase 3.2: Modular core tests
Single responsibility: Test ExecutionMode functionality only

functions.name: test_execution_mode_values
functions.docstring: Test that all execution modes have correct values

functions.docstring: Test mode suggestion for collaborative tasks

functions.name: test_suggest_mode_for_parallel_tasks
functions.docstring: Test mode suggestion for parallel tasks

functions.name: test_mode_use_cases
functions.docstring: Test use cases are available for each mode

functions.name: test_mode_enum_completeness
functions.docstring: Test that we have expected number of execution modes
